title: ABP अस्मिता ने कोलकाता के 10 दिन पुराने वीडियो को अहमदाबाद में पुलिस पर हुआ अटैक बताकर दिखाया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: #WATCH: A crowd, which had gathered at a market place in Tikiapara of Howrah today – defying the lockdown, attacked Police personnel & pelted stones at them when they asked the crowd to return to their homes. 2 police personnel injured. #WestBengal (Video source: Amateur video) pic.twitter.com/EAZbm5wWlc
